# Hitachi UV Solutions Software Download - How to Install and Use
 
If you own a Hitachi UV-Vis spectrophotometer, you may want to download and install Hitachi UV Solutions software. This software is designed to help you perform various tasks with your instrument, such as data acquisition, analysis, reporting, and management. In this article, we will show you how to download, install and use Hitachi UV Solutions software for your UV-Vis spectrophotometer.
 
## How to Download Hitachi UV Solutions Software
 
To download Hitachi UV Solutions software, you need to visit the official website of Hitachi High-Tech Analytical Science. Here is the link: [https://www.hitachi-hightech.com/global/product\_detail/?pn=ana-uv-solutions](https://www.hitachi-hightech.com/global/product_detail/?pn=ana-uv-solutions)
 
**Download ››› [https://kolbgerttechan.blogspot.com/?l=2uxii5](https://kolbgerttechan.blogspot.com/?l=2uxii5)**


 
On this page, you will find a brief introduction of the software, as well as a download button. Click on the download button and follow the instructions to complete the download process. You will need to provide some basic information, such as your name, email address, and country of residence.
 
The file size of the software is about 300 MB, so it may take some time to download depending on your internet speed. Once the download is finished, you will have a zip file named "UVSolutions.zip" on your computer.
 
## How to Install Hitachi UV Solutions Software
 
To install Hitachi UV Solutions software, you need to unzip the file "UVSolutions.zip" that you downloaded. You can use any unzip software, such as WinZip or 7-Zip. After unzipping the file, you will have a folder named "UVSolutions" on your computer.
 
Open the folder "UVSolutions" and double-click on the file "setup.exe". This will launch the installation wizard of Hitachi UV Solutions software. Follow the instructions on the screen to complete the installation process. You will need to accept the license agreement, choose the destination folder, and select the components that you want to install.
 
The installation process may take several minutes to finish. Once it is done, you will have a shortcut icon of Hitachi UV Solutions software on your desktop. You can also access the software from the Start menu or the Programs folder.
 
## How to Use Hitachi UV Solutions Software
 
To use Hitachi UV Solutions software, you need to connect your Hitachi UV-Vis spectrophotometer to your computer via a USB cable or an Ethernet cable. Make sure that your instrument is turned on and ready to use.

Double-click on the shortcut icon of Hitachi UV Solutions software on your desktop or launch it from the Start menu or the Programs folder. This will open the main window of Hitachi UV Solutions software. Here you can see four tabs: Data Acquisition, Data Analysis, Data Report, and Data Management.
 
Data Acquisition tab allows you to set up and perform various measurements with your instrument, such as absorbance, transmittance, reflectance, concentration, kinetics, etc. You can also calibrate your instrument, adjust the wavelength range and resolution, select the scan mode and speed, etc.
 
Data Analysis tab allows you to manipulate and process the data that you acquired with your instrument, such as smoothing, baseline correction, peak picking, derivative calculation, spectrum comparison, etc. You can also apply various mathematical functions and formulas to your data.
 
Data Report tab allows you to create and print customized reports of your data in various formats, such as PDF, Excel, Word, etc. You can also export your data to other applications or databases.
 
Data Management tab allows you to organize and manage your data in a hierarchical structure of folders and files. You can also search for specific data by using keywords or filters.
